articles.description: All the latest football news and updates, plus transfer latest and build-up to this week's international fixtures.

articles.description: England midfielder Jordan Henderson says criticism of his move to Saudi Arabian club Al-Ettifaq "really hurt".
articles.title: Criticism over Saudi move 'really hurt' - Henderson

articles.description: In the latest episode of Born To Brawl, undisputed middleweight boxing world champion Claressa Shields opens up about her harrowing journey to the top of her sport.
articles.title: 'I wouldn't wish what I went through on my worst enemy'

articles.description: A fan is thrown out of the US Open after being accused by Alexander Zverev of using "the most famous Hitler phrase there is in this world".
articles.title: Zverev accuses fan of using 'most famous Hitler phrase'

articles.description: Brazil withdraw Manchester United winger Antony from their squad following allegations of abuse by his former girlfriend.
articles.title: Brazil drop Man Utd's Antony after abuse claims

articles.description: Governing body the FIA confirms all 10 Formula 1 teams complied with the sport's cost cap in 2022.
articles.title: Every team met spending rules last season - FIA

articles.description: Mason Greenwood is welcomed by Getafe fans as the on-loan Manchester United forward takes part in an open training session with his new team.

articles.description: Evan Ferguson is ruled out of the Republic of Ireland's Euro 2024 qualifiers against France and the Netherlands because of injury.
articles.title: Republic striker Ferguson out of Euro qualifiers
